name: speluncaphobia (itch)
description:
Warning: This game has a very DANGEROUS virus called the "we didn't have time to finish the game and there is a lot of bugs and it's kind of unplayable and we over scoped" which is very unfortunate :(

 Speluncaphobia Controls:

retry: Ctrl + R

Inventory slots: 1,2,3,4,5

move: W,A,S,D

Interact: LMB

Inventory: TAB

How to play: Gather recourses and kill enemies to be able to craft the teleporter. Go to 5 different mines and voila you won!

Story: You are a solider in the us army. The army sent you to contaminate the creatures in the mines that have killed many miners. Once inside you have to gather 4 parts of the teleporter to teleport to 15 different mines. Will you be able to complete the mission?
